title: Coref By MLP, CNN, Coattention
description: This kernel implements 4 DL models for coreference resolution. All the model in this kernel are Non-RNN Based DL models. Features extraction used in this kernel follows Clark and Mannings work: https://nlp.stanford.edu/pubs/clark2016improving.pdf If you are interested in RNN based End2End coreference solution model, please check this kernel: https://www.kaggle.com/keyit92/end2end-coref-resolution-by-attention-rnn.
description_lemmatized: kernel implement 4 dl model coreference resolution model kernel nonrnn based dl model feature extraction used kernel follows clark mannings work httpsnlpstanfordedupubsclark2016improvingpdf interested rnn based end2end coreference solution model please check kernel httpswwwkagglecomkeyit92end2endcorefresolutionbyattentionrnn
